meanings.definition: The space under a desk where a person can comfortably place their knees while sitting.
meanings.sent1: I bumped my knee on the kneehole of the desk.
meanings.sent2: She slid her chair closer to the desk to reach the kneehole.
meanings.sent3: The cat peeked out from the kneehole, surprising everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: His laughter echoed from the kneehole, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The kneehole was so snug, it felt like a cozy cave for my legs.

meanings.definition: A hole or opening in a piece of furniture designed to accommodate the knees of a person sitting at it.
meanings.sent1: The antique desk had a beautifully carved kneehole.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the chair to fit perfectly under the kneehole.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy got stuck in the kneehole of the chair.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes widened as she discovered a secret compartment hidden in the kneehole.
meanings.sent5: The kneehole was so well-crafted, it seemed to invite you to sit and work.
